content.query:
DROP EXTERNAL TABLE DIM_Dates;

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'synapse_citylogisticsstorage_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [synapse_citylogisticsstorage_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE DIM_Dates (
	[Posting_Date] nvarchar(4000),
	[Posting_DateTime] nvarchar(4000),
	[Day_of_Week] nvarchar(4000),
	[WeekEnd] int,
	[Posting_MonthEndDate] nvarchar(4000),
	[Posting_MonthStartDate] nvarchar(4000),
	[Posting_MonthNo] nvarchar(4000),
	[Posting_Year] int,
	[Posting_Period] nvarchar(4000),
	[Posting_Month] nvarchar(4000),
	[Fin_MonthNo] int,
	[Fin_Year] int,
	[TmpWeek] int,
	[Min1stWeek] nvarchar(4000),
	[FirstWeek] int,
	[Posting_WeekNo] bigint,
	[Holiday] int,
	[Working_Day] int
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'DataLake/Structured/Dimensions/DIM_DATES.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [synapse_citylogisticsstorage_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.DIM_Dates
GO
